info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:36AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hancock, south central Henderson and western McDonough Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 735 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colmar, or 13 miles southwest of Macomb, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fandon around 740 AM CDT. Colchester and Tennessee around 750 AM CDT. Western Illinois University around 755 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Blandinsville and Sciota. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
